Name: POTION
Explain: A spray-type wound medicine.\nIt restores the HP of one POK*MON\nby 20 points.

Name: SUPER POTION
Explain: A spray-type wound medicine.\nIt restores the HP of one POK*MON\nby 50 points.

Name: HYPER POTION
Explain: A spray-type wound medicine.\nIt restores the HP of one POK*MON\nby 200 points.

Name: ANTIDOTE
Explain: A spray-type medicine.\nIt heals one Pok*mon from a\npoisoning.

Name: BURN HEAL
Explain: A spray-type medicine.\nIt heals one POK*MON of a burn.

Name: FULL HEAL
Explain: A spray-type medicine.\nIt heals all the status problems\nof one POK*MON.

Name: POK* BALL
Explain: A BALL thrown to catch a wild\nPOK*MON. It is designed in a\ncapsule style.
